title: Repo Divorcées
description: They say the two best days of your life are when you buy a boat and when you sell a boat. But they never account for that third day when your friendly neighborhood repo gals simply take it away.
quote: We’re searching for a diamond watch because this douche cared more about that timepiece than quality time with his wife.
altHero: the ladies of Repo Divorcées in their denim jumpsuits
alt1: divorcée in the dark, holding a flashlight and wearing a thick diamond necklace
alt4: Desirée smiling in the Repo truck
